sentences.sContent: Silva issued a statement denying all knowledge of the affair.
sentences.sCn: 西尔瓦发表声明，宣称对此事一无所知。

sentences.sContent: Abortion is a highly controversial issue.
sentences.sCn: 堕胎是个很有争议的话题。

sentences.sContent: ...Another issue affecting real estate in the coming year will be America’s failing infrastructure...
...The report says America’s urbanization will continue to be the most significant issue affecting the industry...
...This is going to be the next big environmental issue after climate change...
...Last month the Academy of Medical Royal Colleges published a report saying that obesity is the greatest public health issue affecting the UK and urging government to do something...
...The privacy issue has already landed Facebook in hot water in Washington...
...I will discuss the positive and negative effects of this issue and offer my own view on it...
...The study will appear in the November issue of The Journal of Applied Developmental Psychology...

synos.tran: 问题；流出；期号；[会计]发行物
[会计]发行，发布；发给；放出，排出
[会计]发行；流出；造成…结果；传下

phrases.pCn: 热点问题；[证券]热门股票（上市后不久价格猛涨）
v. 由…产生；传下；从…流出
现刊；现期杂志；近期杂志

trans.tranOther: to officially make a statement, give an order, warning etc
a subject or problem that is often discussed or argued about, especially a social or political matter that affects the interests of a lot of people
